attributes.action: English Parliament in a Federal State
attributes.additional_details: It is time that all constituent nations, principalities and provinces of the UK have their own ‘state’ governments. Giving the state governments equal powers, but subordinate to a national government in Westminster.  Make the UK a strong federal union.

rejection.details:
Petition Title: Creation of a UK Federal System

Created By: M Powis

Closing: 13/11/2014
